1.Title: Binding Chains
1.Description: When an attack hits an enemy, DMG and Daze from <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> increase by <color=#2BAD00>6%</color> for 8s, stacking up to 5 times. This effect can trigger at most once during each skill. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
